title: Timer for BMX, Bike, Sprint and athletic
description:
Open Source Training Timer. The perfect solution for timing sprints, track running, BMX, speed training, skiing, skating. Ideal for workouts where precision and convenience are essential.

 📡 Technical Specifications:
• Controller: NodeMCU ESP8266 or Wemos.
• Range: up to 250 m (line of sight).
• Sensors: IR (2–3 m "gate") or Laser (7–8 m "gate").
• Power Supply: 5V via Power Bank.
